file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-23-02-04 - NO-SMOKING SIGN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NO-SMOKING SIGN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the no smoking sign. B. The no smoking sign is located on the right-hand PSU installation and the left-hand PSU structure installation. C. Attention must be given to safety precautions presented below, when working on the no smoking sign. • Disconnect the electrical power. • Always use insulated tools when working on or near electrical circuits. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-23-02-000-801-A NO SMOKING SIGN - REMOVAL ALL 33-23-02-400-801-A NO SMOKING SIGN - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-23-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. NO SMOKING SIGN - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the no smoking sign. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the task Passenger cabin H. Removal of the No Smoking Sign (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the lens cover (1) from the housing assembly (4). (2) Remove the lamps (2). CAUTION: THE PCB ASSEMBLY CONTAINS SENSITIVE ELECTRONIC COMPONENTS THAT CAN BE DAMAGED BY ELECTROSTATIC DISCHARGE AND ROUGH HANDLING. HANDLE THE PCB ASSEMBLY WITH CARE TO PREVENT DAMAGE. (3) Remove the PCB assembly (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-23-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL No Smoking Sign - Removal/Installation Figure 401 4. HOUSING ASSY DET. A 3. PCB ASSY 2. LAMP 1. LENS COVER EM145AMM331020A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-23-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. NO SMOKING SIGN - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the no smoking sign. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the task Passenger cabin H. Installation of the No Smoking Sign (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A CAUTION: THE PCB ASSEMBLY CONTAINS SENSITIVE ELECTRONIC COMPONENTS THAT CAN BE DAMAGED BY ELECTROSTATIC DISCHARGE AND ROUGH HANDLING. HANDLE THE PCB ASSEMBLY WITH CARE TO PREVENT DAMAGE. (1) Install the PCB assembly (3). (2) Install the lamps (2). (3) Install the lens cover (1) on the housing assembly (4).
